body.name: Jennov Home Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor - 2K Battery Powered WiFi Indoor Camera for Home Security, IP66 Waterproof Camera, Color Night Vision, 2-Way Talk, AI Human Detection, SD/Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: 【2K Image & Color Night Vision】This home security cameras can support 3MP HD, provides ultra-clear 2K video and image, much clearer than 1080P. Outdoor camera wireless has infrared & white dual-light design, support three night vision(infrared, color, smart), which ensuring that objects within 33 feet can be clearly monitored. Giving you the best night vision experience during the day and night.

【AI Recognition & PIR Detection】This security camera outdoor features with advanced smart AI human detection, which can clear analysis and recognition human. AI PIR sensor can be triggered in real time when the outdoor wireless security camera detect human, at the same time, notification will be send to your phone via the app. The AI human recognition and PIR detection can filter most false alarm, send you notification accurately.

【Rechargeable Battery & IP66 Waterproof】This surveillance & security cameras has 2 long-life rechargeable battery, can be used 3-6 months with one charge. The outdoor wireless camera with IP66 weather resistant and 4000v lightning protection can work indoors and outdoors, in any weather. App will remind you in real time when the wireless outdoor security camera is low battery.

【Two-Way Audio & Instant Siren】The outside camera wireless has built-in microphone and speaker, which support two-way talk. You can make a two-way call in real time to keep touch with your family. When you find something suspicious, the spotlight alarm, instant siren and two-way talk also can drive away thieves and unwanted visitors.

【Easy Installation & SD/Cloud Storage】This outdoor cameras for home security is 100% wire-free, you can install it wherever you want with bracket and screw. Wifi connection, easy operation. This door camera wireless supports up to 128G TF card (not included) and recorded videos can be saved on it. Security camera indoor wireless also support cloud storage.

Jennov outdoor security camera detects intruder at night, siren/spotlight alarm will scare off thief Protect the area you want, reduce false alarm Next page 1 AI Hunan Recognition 2 PIR Detection 3 Two-Way Audio 4 Siren/Spotlight Alarm 5 Customizable Zones & Time

What app does this camera use to connect？ Our outdoor cameras connect using the CloudEdge app. How long does the battery last? Our battery cameras can run continuously for approximately 6 months under normal standby use. How far can the camera be away from wifi router? We recommend that the outdoor camera is no more than 32 feet away from the WiFi router. This is because the transmission distance of WiFi signals can be affected by many factors, such as obstacles, walls, electromagnetic interference, etc. What is the protection level of this camera? Our outdoor cameras are IP66 rated for stable operation even in adverse weather conditions. Does it support 5GHz wifi? Our indoor cameras only support 2.4GHz WiFi, not 5GHz WiFi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy set-up
reviews.reviewText: I had the app on my phone already, so it was a breeze to get it going. The night vision works extremely well. I have set this camera outside about 50' from the router and have no problem with the signal. The no cord connection will work well for me when I leave for vacation because of the convivence of just picking up putting it on a tripod and relocating it anywhere in my home. This wireless camera has more advanced features than a prior more expensive camera which gave a lot of false alarms. I would recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera was easy to connect to my phone via the app and the video is clear and much better than previous cameras I've owned. We are enjoying this camera very much with the timely notifications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Useful Camera
reviews.reviewText: This is a super and well made camera. It is perfect for those hard to reach place with no power. The range seems really good. I expect a good battery life to be good for what it does. It uses the CloudEdge app and was super easy to add a camera with the QR code. I have several Jennov products and the support and product's are top notch. Jennov does need to commit to using one app for all their product's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera has easy setup . It works great ! The price was good and I’m very glad I purchased it ! Night vision works great . Love this camera !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: This camera does its intended purchase. Night vision could be better and I wished there was another way to secure the camera instead of screws. Has a flash drive post and I purchased a flash drive separately. Overall I think if you are looking for a camera this is a decent deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good indoor / outdoor wireless camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I received this item a couple of days ago and so far, it's working asadvertised.It has good video both in B&W and Color during the day and at night.I'm using the camera outside at about 50 feet from my router and thesignal is good as well as a quick response to view and the motion detection.This camera uses an Android app called CloudEdge, which was easy toinstall and setup.The camera also works with Alexa and responds quickly. Unfortunately,it does not send motion alerts to Alexa. Hopefully, Jennov will addAlexa motion alerts to this and their other cameras / apps in the near future.I have a couple of different Jennov cameras and they all have metmy expectations and work better than most of the other brand cameras Ihave used.At the current price point, I would highly recommend / purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install. Nice image quality.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first security camera, so I do not have anything to compare it with. Set up was easy after installing the app on my phone. The only time when I had a little bit of trouble was when my wife also installed the app so that she could also monitor camera activity. For her phone to sync with the camera she had to reset the camera, but that meant that my phone was no longer connected to the camera. If I then wanted my phone connected to the camera I had to reset it, and now her phone no longer recognized the camera. Eventually we discovered a "Device Share" section in the app settings that allowed both of us to connect our phones to the camera. One of the phones appears to act as the primary device for the camera and that phone can invite other phones to join, given them permission to only view images, or to have 'almost' full control over the camera (it appears that the only functionality missing in the secondary phone is the ability to invite other phones to share the camera).After we passed that sharing hiccup everything else has gone well with the camera. The image quality is excellent, even at night. We chose the setting where night vision is mostly black and white but it switches to color when motion is detected (the other choices are B&W all the time or color vision all the time). I was concerned about the strength of our WiFi signal at the location where we wanted to install the camera, but everything went well (indicating both that our router provides a strong enough signal and that the camera has a strong enough sensor to detect the signal).We installed a 128GB SD card to record video. The cloud service seems like an interesting option, and it is reasonably priced, but unfortunately they only accept payment from Google Pay or PayPal, none of which I use. If sometime in the future they decide to take credit cards I may subscribe.The only question remaining in my mind concerns battery life. The specs say that it lasts six months in standby, but with normal use I suspect that it will last a lot less than that. I placed the camera by my front door, and even though I live on a quiet street I expect that recording will be triggered dozens of time per day (kids walking to school, people walking their dogs, etc.). I hope that the battery lasts at least a month before it needs to be recharged, but in any case I intend to get a solar panel that can be connected to the camera through the USB-C charging port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small compared to some other cameras of this style - less of an eyesore
reviews.reviewText: It's nice and small (and mostly white) so you can easily mount this on the side of your light colored house and probably not see it from the street. I don't like people seeing big ugly cameras on my house, I want the security but I don't want to advertise that I use cameras. It uses the Cloudedge app. I have a few other cameras that use that software also. The software is not the best, but I deal with it...and at least this camera uses the same as some others I have. I'm not sure on the wireless range but it works outside my house. Battery life will depend on how often it gets triggered to turn on, so remember that and check your motion settings to best suit your needs. I have not been able to use it enough to notice a battery drain. It would be real cool to hook up a solar panel to it as the directions state and then not have to worry about a low battery. Picture quality is about the same as other cameras in this price range.
